sentences.sentence: Phelps was not made available for an interview. His agent, Peter Carlisle of Octagon, said he had no plans to ask for the release of the images.
sentences.translation: 菲尔普斯没有接受采访。他的经纪人 Octagon 的 Peter Carlisle 也表示，菲尔普斯方面并不准备要求有关方面公布这些图像。

sentences.sentence: He said the Octagon would soon switch to a fuel cell system for heat and electricity, partly to cut energy costs at a time of a depressed rental market.
sentences.translation: 他说奥特根不久将使用燃料电池系统供热和发电，以便在楼房租赁市场低迷的情况下部分地降低能耗。
